Keywords: Animal , Annihilators , Cosmic , Guardians of the Galaxy
Real Name: Cosmo
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering, Characters
CHIEF SECURITY OFFICER OF K.N.O.W.H.E.R.E., AND I SAID NO!!: Mind Control. // POWER: Choose a standard power. Until your next turn, Cosmo has: "Opposing characters within range can't use the chosen power."
SIT!!: Outwit. When Cosmo uses it, the targeted character gains Immobile until your next turn.

Idk, I feel like being able to shut down any power and bypassing STOP clicks or Cosmic Energy without even needing to be within LOF is pretty busted. You could literally carry him with a flyer that's using Running Shot or Charge and immediately shut down any defense powers so I'm with DestructoBoy on this.
